breakingNews.title: Funding Announcement!
breakingNews.text: Massive thank you to our investors DFJ, GE Ventures, Ericsson, and Aspect Ventures, but most importantly to you. We couldn't have gotten this far without the community's validation and input. This new round will help us meet your needs and our goals. Big things on the way!
